value.title: How machine learning is skewing the odds in online gambling
value.excerpt: Commentary: The house always wins in gambling, and the house is getting even tougher through machine learning.

value.title: Astera Labs announces memory acceleration to clear datacenter AI/ML bottlenecks
value.excerpt: Astera Labs announced a memory accelerator platform based on the Compute Express Link (CXL) standard for datacenter devices.

value.title: AI/ML Workloads Need Extra Security
value.excerpt: The need for security is pervading all electronic systems. But given the growth in data-center machine-learning computing, which deals with extremely valuable data, some companies are paying particular attention to handling that data securely.

value.title: AWS and NVIDIA launch “Hands-on Machine Learning with Amazon SageMaker and NVIDIA GPUs” on Coursera
value.excerpt: AWS and NVIDIA are excited to announce the new Hands-on Machine Learning with Amazon SageMaker and NVIDIA GPUs course. The course has four parts, and is designed to help machine learning (ML) enthusiasts quickly learn how to perform modern ML in the AWS Cloud. Sign up for the course today on Coursera.

value.title: 3D printing and machine learning unite to improve cochlear implants
value.excerpt: A team of engineers and clinicians have used 3D printing to create intricate replicas of human cochleae—the spiral-shaped hollow bone of the auditory inner ear—and combined it with machine learning to advance clinical predictions of "current spread" inside the ear for cochlear implant (CI) patients.

value.title: Google Research changes the game for medical imaging with self-supervised learning
value.excerpt: Medical training data has a great cost, which makes it difficult to use deep learning for many apps. Google Research suggests a new solution.

value.title: University of Washington study: Deep learning reveals 3D models of protein machines
value.excerpt: A new study peers into the structure of hundreds of protein complexes, tiny machines in cells that control everything from energy use to DNA replication. Researchers at the University of

value.title: Unsupervised AI arrives for quality inspection
value.excerpt: The quality inspection revolution begins with some wildly independent AI. Quality in manufacturing is mission critical. AI-powered quality inspection is nothing new, but a joint venture from two big players in manufacturing could markedly improve outcomes and reduce barriers to entry.

value.title: Why AI Teams Need A Unified Data Format For Machine Learning Datasets
value.excerpt: Data is the most important commodity today, yet we are still processing data in primitive ways. We need to break free of conventional tools and techniques for data processing. value.title: Microsoft India Proposes Varuna: Scalable, Low-Cost Training of Massive Deep Learning Models

value.title: Google and AWS harness the power of machine learning to predict floods and fires
value.excerpt: Can machine learning from tech giants help the world respond better to environmental disasters like sudden floods and bushfires?

value.title: ML observability platform WhyLabs raises $10M to monitor models and data in production
value.excerpt: WhyLabs, a startup developing an observability platform for machine learning projects, has raised $10 million in venture capital.

value.title: Bushfire mitigation through Machine Learning with AusNet and AWS
value.excerpt: Eastern Australia is among the most fire-prone regions in the world. value.title: Expanding our ML-based flood forecasting
value.excerpt: In 2018 we began our flood forecasting initiative to help combat the catastrophic damage from floods each year by equipping those in harm’s way with accurate and detailed alerts. value.title: Machine Learning Builds Customer Advocacy Beyond Black Friday Spike
value.excerpt: Savvy CPG leaders this holiday season are firing up customer advocacy with an online referral marketing platform that rewards high-value shoppers and their trusted circles for growth long after Black Friday sales peak.

value.title: Landing AI: Unlocking The Power Of Data-Centric Artificial Intelligence

value.title: Landing AI brings in $57M for its machine learning operations tools
value.excerpt: CEO Andrew Ng says industries should adopt a data-centric approach to building AI, which provides a more efficient way for manufacturers to teach an AI model what to do.

value.title: Meet TinyML: The Latest Machine Learning Tech Having An Outsize Business Impact
value.excerpt: As device sensors proliferate across every company’s value chain – from new product development through inspection, tracking, and delivery – tinyML is surfacing to provide actionable insights, transforming business as we know it.

value.title: Interesting AI, ML, NLP Applications in Finance and Insurance
value.excerpt: Many blogs address the effect of AI in the financial and insurance industries, but many of them focus on far-fetched AI and machine learning concepts that have yet to be proven or implemented in either.

value.title: H2O.ai secures $100M, lands partnership with Australian bank
value.excerpt: H2O.ai, an AI development platform, has raised a fresh $100 million, bringing its total to over $250 million at a $1.6 billion valuation.

value.excerpt: Sensors and data are proliferating. Whether it’s from a phone, a car or smart home devices, astonishing amounts of data fuel the work of researchers and product developers conceiving new products and experiences.

value.title: How Adobe uses deep learning to improve its products
value.excerpt: Adobe is leveraging deep learning to improve its apps and solidify its position in the video and image editing market.
